QuestData.Title: Payback's a Lich
QuestData.Description:
We can't be focusin' on da loss of Kal'dran. He be givin' up hope, and dat be someting we not gonna do.
Dis be da time ta strike at Zardrax. His power be waning.
Go inta da heart of his barrow and destroy him, once and for all. Dat should show dem blood trolls who dey messin' with!
I'd help ya, but I be weakened from da blood trolls dat be attackin' me when ya were gone.
Don't worry 'bout me, I can still be handlin' dem animals if dey come back.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Stop Zardrax from empowering the blood trolls!
